thread.section_title: Champerret Elysees - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Honeymoon
thread.title_full: Honeymoon - Review of Champerret Elysees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Emma D
title: Honeymoon
text: A lovely hotel, decorated beautifully. The staff are friendly and very helpfully. The rooms may seem a bit small but they are comfortable and clean with the basics needed. The food was great, no full English option but that doesnt matter, there is plenty to choose from. Several local restaurants around the hotel and Metro stop is very near as is many bus stops.
